title: wtt: my T202 Chance/Shean for T202 Bender or Wheat
author: milkit1

posts.post_title: wtt: my T202 Chance/Shean for T202 Bender or Wheat
posts.post_content:
I have a very presentable T202 Chance/Shean (would probably only get a PSA1 but still nice looking) that is extra in my set. im looking to trade for a T202 Bender or Wheat. If someone has one of those available for trade shoot me an email and Ill get a scan of the Chance.
Thanks
Sean
